name: personal-reading-tracker
description: A personal reading tracker application with progress tracking and highlights management

scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.test:ci: npm run test && npm run test:e2e
scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.docker:test: docker build -t personal-reading-tracker:test . && docker run --rm personal-reading-tracker:test npm run test:ci
